title: The Sordid Duet
description: For the first time ever, the too-hot Sordid series is available everywhere as a set. Meet the seductive and dangerous Markovic brothers and the women who bring them to their knees.  Contains SORDID and TORRID, a duet of dark romance.  “Nikki Sloane is one of the best erotic romance writers writing today.” - Sierra Simone, USA Today Bestselling Author
author: Nikki Sloane
